name: wikipedia - fundraiser disable
description:
Wikipedia makes hella load of money - in October 2014, Wikimedia (owners of Wikipedia) announced to users that they had a $6 million surplus in funds. Just weeks later, they started posting fundraising banners again. I'm sick of these, I've stopped donating and now I've created this small code under cc-0 to hide Jimmy's banner. Think of it as a boycott.
No futher support - released under CC0 - see profile

user.name: daylo
user.about: all styles have now been released under CC0 with no futher support. seems like nobody else gave a shit. if you want support check out the dirty code for yourself. bye~
